{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_Srcr2Attack}} '''A_Srcr2Attack'''
(no parameters) Does nothing if the calling actor does not have a valid target. Otherwise, plays the attack sound on the BODY channel. If the target is within melee range, it receives 20d8 damage. Otherwise, either shoots a {{Class|Sorcerer2FX1|lightning bolt}} at the target, or summons reinforcements by throwing two {{Class|Wizard|Disciple}}-summoning {{Class|Sorcerer2FX2|projectiles}} at 45Â° angles, one on each side. The probability of choosing either attack depends on the calling actor's health: {| border="1" cellspacing="0" !Health!!Lightning!!Summon |- |Between half and full||81.25%||18.75% |- |Less than half||62.5%||37.5% |} This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|Sorcerer2}} and derived classes.
